TextView.android:text: Today's ideas are tomorrow's technology. Think you have an idea that can make a difference? If your answer is yes, then you wouldn't want to miss this event. Blueprint is the ultimate paper presentation contest, encompassing the below mentioned broad categories.

1. There can be a maximum of two members per team.
2. Team members must register online in Tathva '11 website. On registering, members will be mailed a unique Tathva '11 ID which shall be useful during the course of the event.
3. For screening purposes, a pre-event abstract, along with your tathva id's and other details has to be submitted in .pdf or .doc format. The abstract should be mailed to blueprint@tathva.org.
4. In the pre-event abstract to be sent, the participant should mention as to under which department, under which topic he wishes to present the paper.
5. The last date for submission of pre-event abstracts will be 10th October 2011.
6. Short listed teams will be informed by mail. A list of short listed teams will also be displayed on the Tathva '11 website.
7. The participants will be given 20 minutes to present their paper before a panel of judges.
8. 15 minutes will be for presentation and 5 minutes for the Viva.
9. The participant is expected to bring 3 hard copies as well as a soft copy of the paper.
